code: @Test public void testSendingTwoWayMessage() throws Exception {     String result = template.requestBody("direct:twowayMessage", "Willem", String.class).     assertEquals("Can't get the right response", result, "Hello Willem"). }

@Test public void testSendingOneWayMessage() throws Exception {     template.sendBody("direct:onewayMessage", "Greet").     HelloWorldService service = getMandatoryBean(HelloWorldService.class, "helloService").     assertEquals("We should call the service", service.getGreetName(), "Greet"). }
